description: Assert element is visible on the page
Assert element is hidden or not visible
Assert element is attached to the DOM
Assert element is detached from the DOM
Assert element is within the viewport
Assert element is at least 50% visible in viewport
Assert element is 100% visible in viewport
Assert element is covered by another element (overlay detection)
Assert element is outside the viewport
Assert element exists and is rendered exactly once
Assert element is visible and stable (animation complete)
Assert element is above the fold (visible without scrolling)
Assert element contains specific text (case-sensitive substring)
Assert element text matches exactly (full text comparison)
Assert element text matches a regular expression pattern
Assert element contains text (case-insensitive)
Assert element text is empty or blank
Assert element has non-empty text content
Assert element text starts with specific string
Assert element text ends with specific string
Assert element text has specific character length
Assert element text has no leading/trailing whitespace
Assert element text has specific word count
Assert text appears specific number of times on page
Assert element does not contain specific text
Assert element text contains only numeric characters
Assert element text contains only alphabetic characters
Assert element is enabled and interactable
Assert element is disabled and not interactable
Assert checkbox or radio button is checked
Assert checkbox or radio button is not checked
Assert option or item is selected (for dropdowns/lists)
Assert element has keyboard focus
Assert input field is readonly
Assert form field has required attribute

pattern:
const isValid = await page.locator('${selector}').evaluate((el: HTMLInputElement) => el.validity.valid);
await expect(isValid).toBe(true);
description: Assert form field passes HTML5 validation

pattern:
const isValid = await page.locator('${selector}').evaluate((el: HTMLInputElement) => el.validity.valid);
await expect(isValid).toBe(false);
description: Assert form field fails HTML5 validation

pattern:
const isIndeterminate = await page.locator('${selector}').evaluate((el: HTMLInputElement) => el.indeterminate);
await expect(isIndeterminate).toBe(true);
description: Assert checkbox is in indeterminate state
Assert element is editable (not disabled or readonly)
Assert button is in pressed state (toggle buttons)
Assert collapsible element is expanded
Assert collapsible element is collapsed
Assert element has specific attribute (exists)
Assert element attribute has specific value
Assert element attribute contains substring
Assert element attribute matches regex pattern
Assert element has specific data-* attribute
Assert element has specific aria-label value
Assert element has specific ARIA role
Assert input field has specific value
Assert input field is empty
Assert input field has specific placeholder text
Assert link href attribute equals specific URL
Assert element has specific CSS class
Assert element has specific CSS property value
Assert element has specific background color
Assert element has specific text color
Assert element has specific font size
Assert element has specific width
Assert element has specific height
Assert element has specific display property
Assert element has specific opacity value

pattern:
const computedStyle = await page.locator('${selector}').evaluate((el) => window.getComputedStyle(el).getPropertyValue('${property}'));
await expect(computedStyle).toBe('${value}');
description: Assert element computed style property value

pattern:
const pseudoContent = await page.locator('${selector}').evaluate((el) => window.getComputedStyle(el, '::${pseudo}').getPropertyValue('content'));
await expect(pseudoContent).toBe('"${content}"');
description: Assert pseudo-element (::before/::after) content

pattern:
const animations = await page.locator('${selector}').evaluate((el) => el.getAnimations());
await expect(animations.length).toBeGreaterThan(0);
description: Assert element has active CSS animations
Assert element is responsive to viewport changes
Assert exact element count
Assert minimum element count
Assert maximum element count
Assert element count is within range

pattern:
const count = await page.locator('${selector}').count();
await expect(count).toBeGreaterThan(${count});
description: Assert element count exceeds threshold
Assert no elements match selector

pattern:
const count = await page.locator('${selector}').count();
await expect(count).toBeGreaterThan(0);
description: Assert collection is not empty
Assert collection is empty
Assert current page URL matches exactly
Assert URL contains substring
Assert URL matches regex pattern
Assert URL query parameter has specific value

pattern:
const url = new URL(page.url());
await expect(url.hash).toBe('${hash}');
description: Assert URL hash/fragment equals specific value

pattern:
const url = new URL(page.url());
await expect(url.pathname).toBe('${pathname}');
description: Assert URL pathname equals specific value
Assert URL search string contains substring
Assert navigation to specific page occurred
Assert page title matches exactly
Assert page title contains substring

pattern:
const request = await page.waitForRequest((req) => req.url().includes('${url}'));
await expect(request).toBeTruthy();
description: Assert HTTP request was made to specific URL

pattern:
const response = await page.waitForResponse((res) => res.url().includes('${url}'));
await expect(response).toBeTruthy();
description: Assert HTTP response was received from specific URL

pattern:
const response = await page.waitForResponse((res) => res.url().includes('${url}'));
await expect(response.status()).toBe(${statusCode});
description: Assert HTTP response status code equals specific value
Assert HTTP response body contains specific text
Assert HTTP response JSON has specific field

pattern:
const request = await page.waitForRequest((req) => req.url().includes('${url}'));
await expect(request.headers()['${header}']).toBe('${value}');
description: Assert HTTP request header has specific value

pattern:
const response = await page.waitForResponse((res) => res.url().includes('${url}'));
await expect(response.headers()['${header}']).toBe('${value}');
description: Assert HTTP response header has specific value
Assert no console errors were logged

pattern:
const value = await page.evaluate((key) => localStorage.getItem(key), '${key}');
await expect(value).toBe('${value}');
description: Assert localStorage key has specific value

pattern:
const value = await page.evaluate((key) => sessionStorage.getItem(key), '${key}');
await expect(value).toBe('${value}');
description: Assert sessionStorage key has specific value
Assert cookie has specific value
Assert cookie exists
Assert cookie does not exist

pattern:
const value = await page.evaluate((key) => localStorage.getItem(key), '${key}');
await expect(value).not.toBeNull();
description: Assert localStorage key exists

pattern:
const value = await page.evaluate((key) => sessionStorage.getItem(key), '${key}');
await expect(value).not.toBeNull();
description: Assert sessionStorage key exists

pattern:
const naturalWidth = await page.locator('${selector}').evaluate((img: HTMLImageElement) => img.naturalWidth);
await expect(naturalWidth).toBeGreaterThan(0);
description: Assert image loaded successfully (naturalWidth > 0)
